verses.translation: Yarahonye Abu Lahabi, aragahona ku kubera ukubangamira kwiwe Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah).

verses.arabic_text: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ
verses.translation: Amatungo yiwe, eka n’abana biwe, nta co bizomumarira ngo bimukingire ibihano vy’Imana Allah.
Azokwinjira mu muriro ururumba cane, maze awote;
Ari kumwe n’umugore wiwe (Ummu Jamiila), yahora yikorera amahwa akayatega mu nzira Intumwa y’Imana (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah) icamwo;
Uyo mukenyezi, azotabwa mu muriro aboheshejwe mw’izosi ikiziriko gitsivye neza.
